entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
